name: covid-19-test-result
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.lint: node_modules/.bin/speccy lint -s openapi-tags -s operation-tags specification/covid-19-test-result.yaml --skip default-and-example-are-redundant
scripts.publish: mkdir -p build && node_modules/.bin/speccy resolve specification/covid-19-test-result.yaml -i | poetry run python scripts/yaml2json.py | poetry run python scripts/set_version.py > build/covid-19-test-result.json

author: NHS Digital
